original_text: And he did what was evil in the sight of the Lord, according to all that Jehoiakim had done.
korean_text: 그가 여호야김의 모든 행위를 본받아 여호와 보시기에 악을 행한지라

sentences.original_text: And he did what was evil in the sight of the Lord,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 주님 보시기에 악한 일을 행했고,

sentences.original_text: according to all that Jehoiakim had done.
sentences.korean_translation: 여호야김이 행한 모든 일과 같이 하였더라.
